title: E-Commerce Mobile App Development
description: We are looking for an experienced React Native developer to build a cross-platform mobile application for our clothing brand. The app needs to support user authentication, product browsing, a shopping cart, and Stripe payment integration. The design is already finalized in Figma.

title: Corporate Website Redesign
description: Our law firm needs a modern, responsive website. The current site is outdated. We need a clean, professional design with a blog section, contact forms, and team profiles. SEO optimization is a must.

title: Python Data Scraper for Real Estate
description: I need a Python script to scrape real estate listings from 3 major property websites daily. The data should be cleaned and saved into a MongoDB database. Needs to handle proxies and captchas.
